A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many things going on in the movie in my opinion: confusion. The transitions between the scenes is poorly connected and bad executed. You have the impression of a continue parade of special guests going on during the entire movie. It could have been better than that. It could at least have a coherent story from beginning to the end. The film could have ended much earlier. What we see in the film could have been diluted in two films with a better direction and screenplay\, eliminating some useless and really ugly scenes. I really enjoyed the story between Kylo Ren and Rey\, but not the ending part that actually nullifies the growth of the characters developed during the movie.
